newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: IHC Caland wins some big orders.
newsitem.headline: IHC Caland wins some big orders.

text.p: Shipbuilding and engineering group IHC Caland NV said on Friday it had won a large number of orders.
IHC said in a statement it recently won a number of large orders, one of which was given by Brazilian oil firm Petrobas.
New orders in the current year so far totalled 1.29 billion guilders, compared with 745 million in the first half.

IHC said it had signed a letter of intent with Dutch dredging firm Van Oord to build a suction hopper dredger and another letter of intent with the Dredging Corporation of India for building a similar vessel.
